Hi Kathy, 

We can confirm that the stylist email is working.
The case for Jenny Luxton. I checked some of the proposals assigned to her and it seems that the stylist email is empty (Which I have fixed already).

It should be working fine now.

Hi Joel,

Thanks for confirming.

Are you able to check that the confirmation emails are also going through to the specific stylist on the proposal too?

Jenny Luxton mentioned that the one sent this morning (attached) didn't go through to her as it has been previously.

Thanks,
Kathy

Hi Kathy and Danielle,

We have made the changes below.
- Notification to klyrtzis@novaricollective.com once a proposal is accepted (ADL)
- Notification to dgerlach@novaricollective.com once a proposal is accepted (MLB)
- PDF now has a contact details. (Please see the attached.)

Hi Heath,

Can you please arrange for a copy of the PDF to be sent to my email for all ADL quotes once accepted too?

Thanks,

Kathy

On 18 Nov 2021, at 12:21 pm, Danielle Gerlach <dgerlach@novaricollective.com> wrote:

Hi Heath,

Hope you are well.

Ahead of the switch on over to the new Quote platform for Novari MLB/ADL we held a training session this morning with our Senior Stylists, Trade managers and Campaign flow partners.

Following that can you please confirm the following details at your soonest convenience;

  • When will new version of Quote platform go live? (We were hoping as of Monday 22nd November)

***Yes we can do the change over on Sunday night, so it's ready for Monday morning.

  • Will any logins/passwords require resetting by our team or will the new portal appear using existing account logins?

***Yes, it will use the existing logins that you use to login to the staging site. Worst case, you can simply click the 'forgot password' link to reset and access the site.

  • Regarding historic quotes already in the system-will these display the payment options current at the time of creation, or will they change to offer the new payment options (Campaign flow, Pay on Success & Paylater)?

***All quotes (existing and new) will use the new payment options from the time we launch the new platform.

We also require our website to display the new payment options, please refer to Advantage to have ours mirror this on Novari Collective Website. Would like this done simultaneously with the quote platform change over going live. Please let us know if you require anything at our end to complete this.

**We can change the payment options at the same time as going live with the new platform.

Look forward to hearing back, thank you.

Regards,

Danielle Gerlach
BUSINESS MANAGER

0437 320 704 | dgerlach@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | 74-76 Industrial Drive. Braeside VIC 3195
